text:
```    Q_k_yksikko = SharedArray{Float64,2}(9,101)

    @distributed for y = 1:9

        for x = 6:101

            Sijainti = ((y - 1) * 96) + (x - 5)

            Q_k_yksikko[y,x] = Dekoodattu[Sijainti] * Q_rakennemax[y]

        end```
Interesting.. Without @distributed this works, but this not. What could be problem?

elements.text:
Q_k_yksikko = SharedArray{Float64,2}(9,101)

    @distributed for y = 1:9

        for x = 6:101

            Sijainti = ((y - 1) * 96) + (x - 5)

            Q_k_yksikko[y,x] = Dekoodattu[Sijainti] * Q_rakennemax[y]

        end
Interesting.. Without @distributed this works, but this not. What could be problem?
